test.name: Application Should Run Successfully

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` contains ``item`` one or more times.

test.doc: Test if the server application runs without errors.

test.name: Should Detect Malicious Packets

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${output} = Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 76: malicious attack data | Size: 36 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:02 2024 Received Packet: Connection 30: normal packet data | Size: 33 bytes | Timestamp: ...
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.msg: ${malicious_packets} = ['Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 76: malicious attack data | Size: 36 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:02 2024', 'Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 64: malicious attack data | Size: 36 b...
kw.arg: [line for line in '''${output}'''.splitlines() if 'Malicious Packet Detected' in line]
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Log Many
kw.msg: ['Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 76: malicious attack data | Size: 36 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:02 2024', 'Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 64: malicious attack data | Size: 36 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:02 2024', 'Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 72: malicious attack data | Size: 36 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:03 2024', 'Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 41: malicious attack data | Size: 36 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:03 2024', 'Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 57: malicious attack data | Size: 36 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:04 2024', 'Malicious Packet Detected: Connection 0: malicious attack data | Size: 35 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:04 2024']
kw.doc: Logs the given messages as separate entries using the INFO level.

test.doc: Check that malicious packets are correctly detected in the output.

test.name: Should Display Packet Info Correctly

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${output} = Received Packet: Connection 73: normal packet data | Size: 33 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:04 2024 Received Packet: Connection 21: normal packet data | Size: 33 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14...
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Split String
kw.msg: ${lines} = ['Received Packet: Connection 73: normal packet data | Size: 33 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov 6 14:54:04 2024', 'Received Packet: Connection 21: normal packet data | Size: 33 bytes | Timestamp: Wed Nov ...
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.

kw.name: Should Match Regexp
kw.doc: Fails if ``string`` does not match ``pattern`` as a regular expression.
